title: Define Project Requirements - IoT Smart Home System (Updated)
description: Gather and document comprehensive requirements for the IoT Smart Home system. This includes specifications for lighting (smart bulbs, dimming, color temperature, compatibility with smart home platforms such as Amazon Alexa, Google Home), temperature control (individual room control, smart thermostats, compatibility with Nest or Honeywell thermostats), security systems (cameras, alarms, door locks, compatibility with Arlo or Ring devices), necessary integrations (voice assistants, mobile apps, integration with Google Home and Amazon Alexa for voice control, mobile app development for iOS and Android platforms), and ensuring compatibility with existing home technologies. Additionally, document any preferences or unique features requested by the end-users, such as scene settings, remote access, and automation rules. The requirements documentation should also address security considerations, user privacy, and data protection strategies.

title: Design IoT Smart Home Architecture
description: Create a design for the IoT Smart Home system, including integration of IoT devices and automation features.

title: Develop Backend System
description: Implement the backend system for the IoT Smart Home, handling communication between devices and central control.

title: Develop Frontend Interface
description: Create the user interface for controlling and monitoring the IoT Smart Home system.

title: Implement Device Integration
description: Integrate various IoT devices (lights, temperature controls, security systems) into the overall system.

title: Set Up Database and Data Management
description: Establish the database for storing system data, including user preferences, device state information, and historical data.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the system is secure by implementing proper authentication, authorization, and encryption mechanisms.

title: Perform System Testing
description: Test the overall system functionality, including device integration, automation features, and user interface.
dependencies: Set Up Database and Data Management

title: Deploy IoT Smart Home System
description: Prepare for and deploy the system, ensuring a smooth rollout to users. This task includes system setup, configuration, and integration with existing systems.
